target.name: setup
target.description: Install dependencies, builds docroot, installs Drupal.
target.echo: For a full list of available Phing targets, run:

target.name: setup:behat
target.description: Generates tests/behat/local.yml file for executing Behat tests locally.

target.name: setup:build:all
target.description: Generates all required files for a full build. E.g., (re)builds docroot, etc.

target.name: setup:build:profile
target.description: Build a subsidiary makefile shipped with profile

target.name: setup:composer:install
target.description: Installs project dependencies, including drupal core and contrib.

target.name: setup:check:docroot
target.description: Checks to see if docroot exists. Fails if it does not.

fail.message: The docroot is missing. Please run setup:build:all.

target.name: setup:drupal:settings
target.description: Create local settings files using default settings files.

target.name: setup:drupal:install
target.description: Installs Drupal using credentials from local.settings.php.

target.name: setup:db:sync
target.description: Overwrites local database with upstream database from Acquia Cloud.

target.name: setup:git-hooks
target.description: Installs git hooks to local .git/hooks directory from version controlled scripts/git-hooks directory.

target.name: setup:bolt:update
target.description: Pulls in upstream changes to project template from Bolt repository.
